demo.title: How does it work?
demo.step1: Each day, you receive a new question designed to spark your creativity and help you share your story.
demo.step2: Take time to reflect on your answer and write it in the editor using the formatting tools.
demo.step3: Use the formatting buttons to bold or italicize certain words and create content that stands out.
demo.step4: Copy your response and share it directly on your favorite social media platforms.
